originalText.text:
Altagracia is a great attorney. She is very patient and knowledgeable. Ms Outerbridge did a wonderful job on handling a minor matter. But it was important to me and she made me feel just as important as her biggest client.

Her staff is top notch throughout the entire process and got my issue resolved. Highly recommend.  Thank you!!

originalText.text:
I had a great experience with Altagracia and Charles. I used their firm for a landlord/tenant issue, and they were able to promptly help me and reassure me during an incredibly stressful time in my life.

I was particularly impressed with Altagracia during our initial consultation where she stayed on a call with me well over our allotted time in order to make sure all my questions were answered and that I felt confident in our plan.

If you have any issue with your landlord, you should go right to this firm.

originalText.text: I had a great experience speaking with Outerbridge Law. I contacted them for an initial consultation for a landlord dispute. She allowed me time to speak my story, gave me advice on what things can be done and how to move forward with each step. If any disputes happen in the future I would be sure to refer.

text.text: I had a great experience speaking with Outerbridge Law. I contacted them for an initial consultation for a landlord dispute. She allowed me time to speak my story, gave me advice on what things can be done and how to move forward with each step. If any disputes happen in the future I would be sure to refer.

originalText.text: We had a very positive experience with Altagracia. She displayed empathy and listened attentively to our ongoing issue. Most importantly, she outlined our options very clearly and was honest and direct. She also took time to repeat pieces of the consultation that I missed due to my hearing loss and remained patient in the process of me asking her to repeat. I don't often experience that type of service. We appreciated her frank advice of what to expect and did not sugar coat anything. We highly recommend Outerbridge Law!

originalText.text: Altegracia is a great attorney. She took her time to explain things in great detail, offered different courses of action to take for landlord/tenant dispute. Her staff were prompt and they resolved our issue quickly and amicably. I would recommend her in a heartbeat. Thank you Outerbridge law
